extendedInfo.description: Called "automagical" by Gizmodo, Taglistsâ¢ lets you create and share playlists that mix free music, videos, and photos from multiple places, including Facebook, YouTube, Picasa, and SoundCloud.- Create a Taglist by tagging songs, videos, and photos with the same hash-tag, like #inthedark (See #inthedark here: http://eye-c.tv/twv)- Share Taglists on Twitter and Facebook automatically, and let friends add to your playlist to build your own shared channel that others can watch on any computer- Play Taglists on your Android phone or use Airplay or DLNA to play them on connected TV, A/V receivers, iPod docks, stereos, Apple TV and more.Tech Specs (the geeky stuff) Eye-C plays on your Android phone with an OS Version higher than 2.1. It also plays on other screens and speakers using both Airplay and DLNA standards, which means it can play back on devices including A/V receivers from Pioneer, Denon, Yamaha, Sony and more, connected TVs from Samsung, LG, and Panasonic, set top boxes including WD (Western Digital) and Popcorn Hour, as well as Xbox 360 (with Windows Media Player enabled.  Make sure it's on and THEN look for other players.  When it works, give us 5 stars â this was hard!).Note: Taglists now supports Airport Express on Android versions greater than 2.1.  It doesn't work well on some Android tablets or some HTC Android phones (Eris and Hero) â we're working hard to correct this, and we expect improvements in the next few weeks.For more about Airplay: http://www.apple.com/itunes/airplay/For a full list of compatible DLNA players:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_UPnP_AV_media_servers_and_clients#UPnP_player.2Fclient_hardwareFor a full list of compatible DLNA music and video libraries: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_UPnP_AV_media_servers_and_clients#UPn-P_player.2Fclient_hardware

reviews.title: Network Error
reviews.comment: Dud app with network error. Also why on earth would you need/want to sync with facebook when all you want to use it for is airplay. Looks sus to me. One star too many.
reviews.author: Mark Daniel

reviews.title: Won\'t connect
reviews.comment: Wants you to login to Facebook.   Won\'t work workout it, giving connection error.   Doesn\'t use the phone\'s Facebook credentials.   I suspect it is a scam to steal your account info.
reviews.author: Steven Luke

reviews.title: Network Error
reviews.comment: same problem as observed by other users \"network error\". Why does it require facebook login? Can you explain? Not worth single star!
reviews.author: Avinash Karnik

reviews.title: was fine on gingerbread
reviews.comment: Excellent app for streaming multimedia from my home server to my boxee box.  But now it is not working with Ics or jellybean
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: network error
reviews.comment: I am also getting a network error. My device can access the internet just fine, but when I try to log into the app with Facebook (or as a guest) a window appears that says \'there is an unknown error when connecting to the server. Please try again\' . No luck finding a way to fix. Suggestions?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: network error prevents use
reviews.comment: Just installed on my galaxy tab 10 running ICS. Program opens and tells me a network error has occurred. I am unable to log in through either FB or as guest. I\'m able to get out to the net from the device just fine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: None operational on ICS
reviews.comment: Network error or endless \"initialising\" message. Tried it last month, still no fix as at today. Pity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work at all
reviews.comment: On Acer tablet. Waste of an hour trying to get it to even start up One star is too many
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: they\'ve given up
reviews.comment: network error, Needs \"bookface\" to sign in.
reviews.author: TREVOR N

reviews.title: Brilliant app
reviews.comment: I\'d give it 5 stars if I could play a song to external source and keep browsing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Few bugs with Apple TV
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t resume playing from pause.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Network error when trying to login both on and off of Wi-Fi
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: Network error. Didn\'t even get to home screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Network Error (cont.d)....
reviews.comment: I really wanted this app to work, but looking at the reviews, many have been unable to connect due to a network error since August of 2012 and this is April 1, 2013. I\'m trying to use it on my Nexus 4 and while the store indicates it\'s compatible with the device, it won\'t work due to the network area problem. It doesn\'t appear to me that the app is supported any longer.
reviews.author: Robert Beck

reviews.title: ice cream sandwich
reviews.comment: Since the Upgrade to ICS the app won\'t work anymore. I\'m quite sure it has to do with the upgrade. Has it on several devices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: What a waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \"network error\"
reviews.comment: App says \"network error\" incorrectly. And simply doesn\'t work. Too bad.
reviews.author: Benjamin L

reviews.title: Does work
reviews.comment: Open app, says there is a network error.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Waste of 4mb. I got the same network error message others have gotten.\tThere\'s no network error, I can connect just fine or I would have been able to install this in the first place. Fix it.
reviews.author: bahrta sai

reviews.title: Network error
reviews.comment: Pity that is not even connecting to the network. Good concept, big bug!!!
reviews.author: Juan Diego Arias Espinoza
